Take control. Take control of your money. Teach your children and teenagers how to take control of their money, how to be financially responsible, and how to use sensible money management methods.
What can parents, guardians, and teachers do to teach children and teenagers about money?
Extreme Economics helps answers those questions for families and for teachers.
